problem.script:
from __future__ import division
t1 = random.randrange(0,2,1) t2 = random.randrange(3,5,1)
vav = ((2/3)*((t2)**3 - (t1)**3) - (3/2)*((t2)**2-(t1)**2) - 2*(t2-t1))/(t2 - t1)
problem.p: The velocity of a point, moving along a straight line is given by \( v(t) = 2t^2 - 3t - 2 \) where all coefficients are assumed to have the SI units.
Find the average velocity of the point between $t1 and $t2.
During the first t seconds of motion, the average velocity of the car is zero. Find t.

choicegroup.choice: There is no such value of t.
